thread.title: Ground News - Inuk opera singer and Paralympic medalling doctor appointed to Order of Canada
thread.title_full: Ground News - Inuk opera singer and Paralympic medalling doctor appointed to Order of Canada

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Inuk opera singer and Paralympic medalling doctor appointed to Order of Canada
text:
Summary by Ground News Deantha Edmunds, Canada's first Inuk opera singer, is being made a Member of the Order of Canada. Paralympic medallist Dr. Francine Lemire is being recognized for her work in family medicine. Edmunds and Lemire are part of the latest cohort of Newfoundlanders and Labradorians to be named as members. Share menu More
